content.en: Fractional Optimal Control: Researchers have developed various algorithms to solve different types of fractional optimal control problems. These algorithms are designed to obtain numerical solutions for the proposed problems by utilizing techniques such as Lagrange interpolating functions, Boubaker polynomials, non-standard finite difference method, and spectral-tau method. The algorithms aim to simplify the problem, transform dynamic systems, reduce problems into algebraic equations, and provide accurate computational techniques for solving these complex problems.
content.da: Fraktionel Optimal Kontrol: Forskere har udviklet forskellige algoritmer til at løse forskellige typer af fraktionelle optimal kontrol problemer. Disse algoritmer er designet til at opnå numeriske løsninger for de foreslåede problemer ved at anvende teknikker som Lagrange interpolationsfunktioner, Boubaker polynomier, ikke-standard finite difference metoder og spektret-tau metoder. Algoritmerne har til formål at forenkle problemet, transformere dynamiske systemer, reducere problemer til algebraiske ligninger og give nøjagtige beregningsmetoder til at løse disse komplekse problemer.
